name: Sonic Dunk
description:
Are you get ready to dunk some epic basket? Grab an orb and start dunking until the end!
Sonic Dunk is a unique arcade game that anybody can enjoy! Guide the orb through the rings, unlock new balls, and don’t forget to enjoy the rhythm beside the gameplay, become the next amazing star!

Come on now, join with everybody with the excited unlimited dunk free game in Sonic Dunk!

It's harder than you think!

Show your accuracy skill
Friendly control and simple gameplay
Enhance with the top-hit soundtrack, music content
Feature update weekly
Enhance with new design
